mapper.select: select id, business_key, step_id, project_id, project_no, dept_name, project_name, stage_name, step_name, form_no, contract_no, plan_discuss_time, review_type, design_review_type, design_review_time, submit_total_designer_time, accept_time, send_picture_time, design_major_list, plan_major_list, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_arrange where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, step_id, project_id, project_no, dept_name, project_name, stage_name, step_name, form_no, contract_no, plan_discuss_time, review_type, design_review_type, design_review_time, submit_total_designer_time, accept_time, send_picture_time, design_major_list, plan_major_list, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_arrange
